comments.content: Agree with Lex. Some alternatives: LHF [Hensler 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/hensler2.php), [Naylorville](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/naylorville.php), [State Street](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/statestreet.php), [Antique Half Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/antiquehalfblock.php), [Kirsty](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/kirsty), [Heretic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/heretic), [Dime Box](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/dime-box-wbw), [Teniers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/teniers)

Substitutes:  
Hamilton's Teniers by Wooden Type Fonts [already suggested by Ryuk]  
House of Cards, based on Teniers [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/house-of-cards/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/house-of-cards/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/house-of-cards/")  
Solotype's Goodfellow [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/goodfellow/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/goodfellow/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/solotype/goodfellow/")  
William Page by Wooden Type Fonts 506 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/william-page-506/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/william-page-506/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/woodentypefonts/william-page-506/")  
Sheepman, based on William Page’s No.506, [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/sheepman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/sheepman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/sheepman/")  
Mattox Shuler's Gin and Bourbon [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fort-foundry/gin/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fort-foundry/gin/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fort-foundry/gin/") [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fort-foundry/bourbon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415113629/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fort-foundry/bourbon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fort-foundry/bourbon/")  
Don
